overview: Get ready for a new type of adult viewing experience. A rare, raunchy and racy view of sex as rarlly shown before. The famous purveyor of classy erotica, "Deep Throat's" GERARD DAMIANO, does it again with a different slant on women who work hard for their money, on their backs, and in every position, all to please their weary and worn male customers.
title: Slightly Used
